property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Directory where the NameNode stores its metadata.

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: Directory where the DataNode stores its blocks, tagged as DISK storage.

property.name: dfs.permissions.enabled
property.description: Disable HDFS permissions for easier testing. NOT FOR PRODUCTION.

property.name: dfs.namenode.http-address
property.description: NameNode Web UI address and port.

property.name: dfs.datanode.address
property.description: DataNode data transfer binding address and port (default internal port).

property.name: dfs.datanode.report.address
property.description: Address the DataNode reports to the NameNode for client connections (hostname:NodePort).

property.name: dfs.datanode.ipc.address
property.description: DataNode IPC binding address and port (default internal port).

property.name: dfs.datanode.http.address
property.description: DataNode Web UI binding address and port (default internal port).
